mapper.insert: insert into user(email_id, password, first_name, last_name, nickname, phone_number) values (#{emailId}, #{password}, #{firstName}, #{lastName}, #{nickname} , #{phoneNumber})
mapper.select: select user_id, email_id, password, first_name, last_name, nickname, created_at, phone_number, status from user where user_id = #{userId} and status != 'deleted'
select user_id, email_id, password, first_name, last_name, nickname, created_at, phone_number, status from user where email_id = #{email} and status != 'deleted'
select user_id, email_id, password, first_name, last_name, nickname, created_at, phone_number, status from user where nickname = #{nickname} and status != 'deleted'
select user_id, email_id, password, first_name, last_name, nickname, created_at, phone_number, status from user where status != 'deleted'
mapper.update: update user set password = #{password} where user_id = #{userId}
update user set status = 'deleted' where user_id = #{userId}
